Equipment Actions.Action 1: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 7 Slashing plus 3 Cold

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Yeti can use its Chilling Gaze and makes two Claw attacks
Other Actions.Action 2: Chilling Gaze, The Yeti targets one creature it can see and magically blasts them with with an Average 10 Cold damage and paralyzes them

Abilities.Ability 1: Fear of Fire, The Yeti has a natural fear of fire, causing it to attack at disadvantage when it takes Fire damage
Abilities.Ability 2: Keen Smell, The Yeti has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell
Abilities.Ability 3: Snow Camouflage, The Yeti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain
